long_description: The versatile Coleman Dual-Fuel(TM) 2-burner camp stove runs on white gas or unleaded auto gas so you'll always be ready to cook up a tasty meal. Side WindBlock(TM) guards block wind for maximum cooking performance; guards adjust to accommodate various pot sizes. Large cooking surface provides room for up to two 10 in. pots. Burns up to 2 hrs. on a full tank of fuel; tank holds 2.5 pints of fuel. Main burner supplies 7,500 BTU; auxiliary supplies 6,500 BTU. Stove lid folds down and secures closed for simple travel. Fuel funnel included.
short_description: The versatile Coleman Dual-Fuel(TM) 2-burner camp stove runs on white gas or unleaded auto gas so you'll always be ready to cook up a tasty meal.
